text: læa phwk than cng xya cheux nxkcak kæ phu thi ptibati tam sasna khxng phwk than theanan cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa kha næana nan khux kha næana khx ngxallxhˌ theanan (khux cng xya cheux wa) ca mi phu dı di rab yeiyng thi phwk than di rab hrux (xya cheux wa) khea he la nan ca toyæng phwk than n phracea khxng phwk than ley cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa thæcring khwam pordpran nan xyu n phrahatth khx ngxallxhˌ sung phraxngkh k ca thrng prathan man hı kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng phisal phuthrng rxbru
